definition: To pay close attention to, value, or regard something or someone with high esteem, often used in the context of considering someone's opinions, wishes, or needs. It can also refer to the act of taking care of or being cautious about something.

examples.english: I take care of my health.

examples.german: Bitte achten Sie auf die Sicherheitshinweise.
examples.english: Please pay attention to the safety instructions.

examples.german: Er achtet darauf, p√ºnktlich zu sein.
examples.english: He makes sure to be on time.

examples.german: Wir sollten auf unsere Umwelt achten.
examples.english: We should care about our environment.

examples.german: Achte darauf, dass du genug trinkst.
